Sentencas: The ferritic stainless steel Crofer 22 APU is attractive for the use as interconnects in solid oxide fuel cell stacks.
Titulo: Effect of pre-oxidation on the oxidation resistance of Crofer 22 APU

Sentencas: The oxidation rate of this alloy in air at 800 degrees C was reduced by pre-oxidation at higher temperatures in either air or N-2-9%H-2-1%H2O.
Titulo: Effect of pre-oxidation on the oxidation resistance of Crofer 22 APU

Sentencas: Conversely, the oxidation rate increased when the alloy grain size was increased by heat-treating in H-2 (pO(2) similar to 10(-21) atm).
Titulo: Effect of pre-oxidation on the oxidation resistance of Crofer 22 APU

Sentencas: In all cases the scale formed on Crofer 22 APU consisted of an outer (Mn,Cr)(3)O-4 layer, an inner Cr2O3 layer and sub-scale MnCr2O4 nodules that preferentially formed at alloy grain boundaries.
Titulo: Effect of pre-oxidation on the oxidation resistance of Crofer 22 APU
